page.title: 12Newborough Playgroup
page.content:
The{Playgroup}can accomodate a maximum of{14}children from{3yrs}to{ {school age}on{3}mornings a week between{9am}and{12 noon.}It is financed by both fees and fund raising with a Supervisor and one helper at each session. A strong link is maintained with the school.
With a book corner for{storytelling and opportunities for{cookery}other facilities include -: {Painting Climbing frame {Sand pit Slide {See-Saw Wheeled toys {Wendy house Lego {Jigsaws Musical instruments { The children have outings to the{Zoo, {fire station}and other places of interest as well as receiving visitors such as the{local police.
